name: Thief Run
description:
Thief Run 3D is a never ending running application in which user need to escape the character to fall into the spaces between rectangle cubes by moving the character left to right by touching the screen left and right, for jump option you have to tap the character. User can collect the food items, coins to gain extra score .

Features
1) Beautiful design 3D environment .
2) Very nice 3D character animations .
3) Application support all iOS devices .
4) You can challenge your friends with the score what you have made by sharing it in Facebook and Twitter.

Don't forget to send your valuable feedback .
